form.official-title: To amend section 320301 of title 54, United States Code, to modify the authority of the President of the United States to declare national monuments, and for other purposes.

section.header: Amendment to authority to declare national monuments
section.text: Section 320301 of title 54, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: A proclamation or reservation under subsection (a) or (b) shall expire 3 years after proclaimed or reserved unless specifically approved byâ€”

paragraph.text: a Federal law enacted after the date of the proclamation or reservation; and
a State law, for each State where the land covered by the proclamation or reservation is located, enacted after the date of the proclamation or reservation.
